translations: [贸易]珠宝商；宝石匠；钟表匠（jeweller 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Big-name jewellers are battling it out to get celebrities to wear their bling.
sentences.translation: 大牌珠宝商们为了让名人们戴他们的高档首饰正在一争高下。

sentences.sentence: Jewellers pay cash for stock, so it seems foolish not to sell as many watches as possible.
sentences.translation: 钟表商花钱换货，不尽可能的多卖岂不愚蠢？

sentences.sentence: A jewellers was also reportedly attacked before plain-clothed police nearby ran in to arrest two looters from the shop.
sentences.translation: 另据报道，一家珠宝店被袭，附近的便衣警察随后进入店中逮捕了两名打劫者。
